oai_dc:dc.dc:title: McCoy family, Thanksgiving 1912
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: [William McCoy]
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: McCoy family, Thanksgiving 1912. [At John McCoy residence, 214 E. Fourth Avenue, Knoxville, TN]. Top:Great-grandmother E. Haynes. Next row (l-r): Mabel McCoy, Will McCoy, Walter Eppes, Carlotta Eppes, Hines McCoy, Gladys McCoy, Grandmother McCoy. Next row, l-r: Flem Cooley, Anna Belle Cooley, Charles Dooley, Loula Dooley, Grandfather McCoy, Mayme and Dave Chandler. Bottom row, l-r: Emily Chandler, Margaret Cooley, William McCoy, Flem Cooley, Dorothy Chandler, James McCoy, Charles Dooley, Robert McCoy.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Families; Group portraits; Holidays;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Knox County Two Centuries Photograph Project
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
